00028 #ifndef _LNET_NIDSTRINGS_H
00029 #define _LNET_NIDSTRINGS_H
00030 #include <lnet/types.h>
00031 
00035 enum {
00036         /* Only add to these values (i.e. don't ever change or redefine them):
00037          * network addresses depend on them... */
00038         QSWLND          = 1,
00039         SOCKLND         = 2,
00040         GMLND           = 3,
00041         PTLLND          = 4,
00042         O2IBLND         = 5,
00043         CIBLND          = 6,
00044         OPENIBLND       = 7,
00045         IIBLND          = 8,
00046         LOLND           = 9,
00047         RALND           = 10,
00048         VIBLND          = 11,
00049         MXLND           = 12,
00050         GNILND          = 13,
00051         GNIIPLND        = 14,
00052 };
00053 
00054 struct list_head;
00055 
00056 #define LNET_NIDSTR_COUNT  1024    /* # of nidstrings */
00057 #define LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE   32      /* size of each one (see below for usage) */
00058 
00059 /* support decl needed by both kernel and user space */
00060 char *libcfs_next_nidstring(void);
00061 int libcfs_isknown_lnd(__u32 lnd);
00062 char *libcfs_lnd2modname(__u32 lnd);
00063 char *libcfs_lnd2str_r(__u32 lnd, char *buf, size_t buf_size);
00064 static inline char *libcfs_lnd2str(__u32 lnd)
00065 {
00066         return libcfs_lnd2str_r(lnd, libcfs_next_nidstring(),
00067                                 LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE);
00068 }
00069 int libcfs_str2lnd(const char *str);
00070 char *libcfs_net2str_r(__u32 net, char *buf, size_t buf_size);
00071 static inline char *libcfs_net2str(__u32 net)
00072 {
00073         return libcfs_net2str_r(net, libcfs_next_nidstring(),
00074                                 LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE);
00075 }
00076 char *libcfs_nid2str_r(lnet_nid_t nid, char *buf, size_t buf_size);
00077 static inline char *libcfs_nid2str(lnet_nid_t nid)
00078 {
00079         return libcfs_nid2str_r(nid, libcfs_next_nidstring(),
00080                                 LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE);
00081 }
00082 __u32 libcfs_str2net(const char *str);
00083 lnet_nid_t libcfs_str2nid(const char *str);
00084 int libcfs_str2anynid(lnet_nid_t *nid, const char *str);
00085 char *libcfs_id2str(lnet_process_id_t id);
00086 void cfs_free_nidlist(struct list_head *list);
00087 int cfs_parse_nidlist(char *str, int len, struct list_head *list);
00088 int cfs_print_nidlist(char *buffer, int count, struct list_head *list);
00089 int cfs_match_nid(lnet_nid_t nid, struct list_head *list);
00090 
00091 int cfs_ip_addr_parse(char *str, int len, struct list_head *list);
00092 int cfs_ip_addr_match(__u32 addr, struct list_head *list);
00093 bool cfs_nidrange_is_contiguous(struct list_head *nidlist);
00094 void cfs_nidrange_find_min_max(struct list_head *nidlist, char *min_nid,
00095                                char *max_nid, size_t nidstr_length);
00096 
00097 struct netstrfns {
00098         __u32   nf_type;
00099         char    *nf_name;
00100         char    *nf_modname;
00101         void    (*nf_addr2str)(__u32 addr, char *str, size_t size);
00102         int     (*nf_str2addr)(const char *str, int nob, __u32 *addr);
00103         int     (*nf_parse_addrlist)(char *str, int len,
00104                                      struct list_head *list);
00105         int     (*nf_print_addrlist)(char *buffer, int count,
00106                                      struct list_head *list);
00107         int     (*nf_match_addr)(__u32 addr, struct list_head *list);
00108         bool    (*nf_is_contiguous)(struct list_head *nidlist);
00109         void    (*nf_min_max)(struct list_head *nidlist, __u32 *min_nid,
00110                               __u32 *max_nid);
00111 };
